sources.title: Yankee Doodle Daffy (1943)
sources.description: Yankee Doodle Daffy is a Warner Bros. Looney Tunes theatrical cartoon short released on June 5, 1943, directed by Friz Freleng and written by Tedd Pierce. The short was the second Technicolor Looney Tunes entry to feature Porky Pig and Daffy Duck (after My Favorite Duck). It is also one of the handfuls of Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies to have fallen into the public domain. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/yankee-doodle-daffy-1943/

metadata.Plot: Daffy is an agent representing Sleepy Lagoon trying to sell him to talent scout Porky. Daffy spends a great deal of time and energy explaining and demonstrating what the kid can do, while the kid sits on a couch licking a giant sucker.
